ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: The Next Generation: Mirror Broken
ComicInfo.Title: Mirror Broken [Prologue]
ComicInfo.Summary: Mirror Broken [Prologue]: In the 24th century in the Mirror Universe, the Klingons and the Cardassians rule the quadrant. The Terran Empire has almost collapsed, and the ISS Stargazer under the command of Jean-Luc Picard is one of their last remaining ships. Lt. Reg Barclay has a secret plan to improve things and increase his standing.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-29 01:50:18. [Issue ID 1697650]
ComicInfo.Characters: Lt. Reginald Barclay (mirror universe),Captain Jean-Luc Picard (mirror universe),other unnamed crewmen,Inquisitor Deanna Troi (mirror universe),Ensign Sam Klock (mirror universe),Lt. Commander Data (mirror universe),Lt. Tasha Yar (mirror universe, death)
